PC DVD Game: Talvisota: Icy Hell
Base release: Finnish release,
Special about this Masteryl-release: - pretty complex and well hidden 
in-game copyright-system disabled
- patch 1.21 already applied (version of base release is 1.20)
- no installation needed
- no mounting needed (DVD-free, "no-CD")
- game manual in English (pdf)
Language: English
Developer(s): Blitzfront Game Studio 
Publisher(s): Nival Interactive (in CIS countries)
Blitzfront Game Studio (in Finland), Engine: Enigma engine 
Platform(s): Windows 
Release date(s): 16.11.2007 (CIS countries), 02.10.2008 (Finland) 
Genre(s): Real-time tactics, Educational game 
Mode(s): Single-player 
Rating(s): VET 12 
Media: DVD 
System requirements (recommended): Windows 98/ME/2000/XP, 1.0 GB (2.0 GB) free space, DirectX 8.1 (9.0c) compatible video and sound card PII 366 MHz (1.0 Ghz) CPU, 64 MB (256 MB) RAM 
Input methods: Keyboard and mouse
